title: Soft geometric sans (like Rotunda)
content:
Hi there, hoping to get some help finding a geometric Futura-like sans, with very subtle rounded edges, similar to Rotunda by Helios Capdevila, but looking for something not mono. Some character is ok.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310071652im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rotonda-alphabet-800_4899.gif)

Any help or thoughts would be appreciated! Thanks.
author: waves

comments.content:
My [Figgins Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310071652/http:/shinntype.com/typefaces/figgins/) might be a candidate, more so for all-caps setting.  
The lower case has single-bowl “g” as an alternate, but no single-bowl “a”.
Not that close to Futura, but you could have a look at our [Telefon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310071652/http:/monokrom.no/fonts/telefon). Very subtly rounded corners.
